```
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: rg                         ![1](assets/1.png)
spec:
  serviceName: random-generator    ![2](assets/2.png)
  replicas: 2                      ![3](assets/3.png)
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: random-generator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: random-generator
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: k8spatterns/random-generator:1.0
        name: random-generator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        volumeMounts:
        - name: logs
          mountPath: /logs
  volumeClaimTemplates:            ![4](assets/4.png)
  - metadata:
      name: logs
    spec:
      accessModes: [ "ReadWriteOnce" ]
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 10Mi
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: random-generator
spec:
  clusterIP: None         ![1](assets/1.png)
  selector:
    app: random-generator
  ports:
  - name: http
    port: 8080
```
